Although asking fox to make a cartoon of the RPG would prove to be 
itneresting it would be rather difficult as I have noticed that the beggining 
posts are no longer there and you would have to contact players long since 
gone on being able to use charachters they created. Plus we really dont have 
an episode type format so scripting the show would be even harder.

--part1_5a.379acd.28fdf6ce_boundary
